featured.text: According to pediatric dentist Dr. Kaneta Lott, the most damaging stuff is something that is sticky or very hard and thus stays in the mouth for a long time.
The roasting heat and high ______ made me feel hot and sticky, no matter what I did to cool off.
They use a range of terms to describe it—stuck-song syndrome, sticky music, cognitive itch, or most commonly “earworm.”

definition.en_def: Having the property of adhering or sticking to a surface.
definition.example: The sticky tape helped to hold the papers together.
